snippet: Midterm election results mean longer odds for this important goal of the Affordable Care Act.
abstract: Editorial expresses dismay that Republican advances in midterm elections at state level have dealt blow to hopes for expanding Medicaid, important goal of Affordable Care Act; supports plan by Health and Human Services Sec Sylvia Matthews Burwell to reach out to recalcitrant states to urge them to accept expansion while ensuring that any customized state approaches do not undermine Medicaid's core features.
lead_paragraph: Midterm election results mean longer odds for this important goal of the Affordable Care Act.

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
